name: Therme Zen white lotus anti-transpirant spray
composition: INGREDIENTS: BUTANE, ISOBUTANE, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, PROPANE, ALUMINUM CHLOROHYDRATE, PARFUM, DIMETHICONE, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, DIMETHICONOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, TALC, BENZYL BENZOATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, EUGENOL.
